comparison

Class ImageMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • comparison.ImageMetrics

  • public class ImageMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    Static library of methods for computing the distance metric between images.
    Author:
    Tristan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImageMetrics.PixelDistance
      Enumeration type permitting specification of the type of pixel distance to use in metric calculations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_JSDIV_NUMBINS
      Default number of 1d histogram bins to use in Jensen-Shannon divergence calculation

      ImageMetrics()

      Computes the Jensen-Shannon divergence between two images (with empirical distributions estimated by the input bin width).

    • Method Detail

      • rmse

        public static double rmse(ImageTTAA i1,
                          ImageTTAA i2,
                          ImageMetrics.PixelDistance d)
                   throws InvalidRequestException
        Computes the rmse between two images, with the specified pixel distance metric. Essentially returns the square root of the average error per pixel over the two images.
        Parameters:
        i1 - image1
        i2 - image2
        d - distance metric function
        Returns:
        rmse distance between i1 and i2
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • rmse

        public static double rmse(ImageTTAA i1,
                          ImageTTAA i2)
                   throws InvalidRequestException
        Computes the rmse between two images, with the default pixel distance metric. Essentially returns the square root of the average error per pixel over the two images.
        Parameters:
        i1 - image1
        i2 - image2
        Returns:
        rmse distance between i1 and i2
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • peakSignalToNoiseRatio

        public static double peakSignalToNoiseRatio(ImageTTAA img1,
                                            ImageTTAA img2)
                                     throws InvalidRequestException
        Computes the peak signal to noise ratio between the two images. Generally compare the original and denoised image; higher PSNR indicates closeness (i.e. better reconstruction)
        Parameters:
        i1 - = image1
        i2 - = image2
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • computeIndependentJensenShannonDivergence

        public static double computeIndependentJensenShannonDivergence(ImageTTAA img1,
                                                               ImageTTAA img2,
                                                               int numBins)
                                                        throws InvalidRequestException
        Computes the Jensen-Shannon divergence between two images (with empirical distributions estimated by the input bin width). Note that it computes the independent JSD between each colour channel and then sums them.
        Parameters:
        img1 -
        img2 -
        numBins - number of bins to use in probability density function estimation
        Returns:
        JSD(i1,i2)
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException

      • computeIndependentJensenShannonDivergence

        public static double computeIndependentJensenShannonDivergence(ImageTTAA img1,
                                                               ImageTTAA img2)
                                                        throws InvalidRequestException
        Computes the Jensen-Shannon divergence between two images (with empirical distributions estimated by the default bin width). Note that it computes the independent JSD between each colour channel and then sums them.
        Parameters:
        img1 -
        img2 -
        Returns:
        JSD(i1,i2)
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException
